txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'The waters of the Dwergfant flow into the Limlight, then down through Stangard and into the Great River. Scouts have reported seeing creatures living within the ancient dwarf-structure: avanc and toads.\n\n'They must not be allowed to stay within it. Even if the Dwergfant is working perfectly, those creatures will foul the waters and destroy Stangard.'
'The waters are secure for now. I am sure more will come and settle back into the Dwergfant, but that is tomorrow's problem.'
'Are you prepared to see a wonder of the dwarves, the Dwergfant?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Avanc and toads are polluting the Dwergfant.
Defeated avanc and toads in the Dwergfant ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat avanc and toads in the Dwergfant ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Avanc and toads can be found at Dwergfant.\n\nAldbéort has asked you to venture to the Dwergfant and defeat the avanc and toads found within.
Aldbéort is at Cliving.\n\nAldbéort will be pleased to hear the avanc and toad population in the Dwergfant has been thinned.
